movie.title: Stan & Ollie
movie.plot: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song - a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 25 nominations.

events.title: Oliver Hardy suffers a heart attack
Laurel and Hardy are welcomed in Ireland
